|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = VOB-NB099HA |icid = 7361A-NB099HA |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The sticker on the back of the device appears to indicate the device uses a combination of BCM4330 and BCM47511.
